name: Firewalker OG
description: Firewalker OG is a sativa-dominant cross between Skywalker and Fire OG that is spicy with hints of flowers and hash. This strain is ideal for daytime use as you will feel full of energy and ready to take on the day. It also has many medicinal qualities, making it potentially beneficial for patients who are suffering from depression, muscle spasms, mood disorders, and anorexia.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Energetic, Euphoric, Happy, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dizzy
